name: stress_overrides

signal_suppression.description: Suppress signals that become unreliable or distorted under elevated stress.

rules.notes: Low-context signals are ignored when cognitive bandwidth shrinks.
Small positive cues are deprioritized under high stress.

signal_amplification.description: Amplify signals that become disproportionately influential under stress.

rules.notes: Threat-related signals intensify early in stress progression.
Identity-inconsistent events become extremely salient under high stress.

vector_overrides.description: Direct modifications to vector outputs based on stress conditions.

rules.notes: Survival orientation receives priority weighting when stress rises.
Conflict response vectors intensify as internal conflict escalates.

motive_priority_overrides.description: Reorders motives that take priority under stress.

rules.notes: Abandonment and betrayal motives dominate mid-high stress range.
Ambivalence motive intensifies during reactive stress states.

notes: Stress overrides apply low-level rule modifications to signals, vectors, and motive priority. This module is executed BEFORE stress_integration.json.
